name: CGFunctionCallbacks
desc: A structure that contains callbacks needed by a CGFunctionRef object.

items.name: init(version: UInt32, evaluate: CGFunctionEvaluateCallback?, releaseInfo: CGFunctionReleaseInfoCallback?)
var evaluate: CGFunctionEvaluateCallback?
items.desc: The callback that evaluates the function.

items.name: var releaseInfo: CGFunctionReleaseInfoCallback?
items.desc: If non-NULL,the callback used to release the info parameterpassed to init(info:domainDimension:domain:rangeDimension:range:callbacks:).

items.name: var version: UInt32
items.desc: The structure version number. For this structure,the version should be 0.
